name: androidpublisher_inappproducts_get
description: Returns information about the in-app product specified.

sku.description: Unique identifier for the in-app product.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: An opaque string that represents a user for quota purposes. Must not exceed 40 characters.

$ul: **defaultLanguage**: The default language of the localized data, as defined by BCP 47. e.g. "en-US", "en-GB".
**currency**: 3 letter Currency code, as defined by ISO 4217.
**priceMicros**: The price in millionths of the currency base unit represented as a string.

**gracePeriod**: Grace period of the subscription, specified in ISO 8601 format. It will allow developers to give their subscribers a grace period when the payment for the new recurrence period is declined. Acceptable values = "P3D" (three days), "P7D" (seven days), "P14D" (fourteen days), and "P30D" (thirty days)
**listings**: List of localized title and description data.
**packageName**: The package name of the parent app.
**prices**: Prices per buyer region. None of these prices should be zero. In-app products can never be free.
**purchaseType**: Purchase type enum value. Unmodifiable after creation.
**sku**: The stock-keeping-unit (SKU) of the product, unique within an app.
**subscriptionPeriod**: Subscription period, specified in ISO 8601 format. Acceptable values are "P1W" (one week), "P1M" (one month), "P3M" (three months), "P6M" (six months), and "P1Y" (one year).
**trialPeriod**: Trial period, specified in ISO 8601 format. Acceptable values are anything between "P7D" (seven days) and "P999D" (999 days). Seasonal subscriptions cannot have a trial period.
